content.rendered:
If you want one of the best designer clothing and fragrance, dior.com is an interesting website to card for them.
Fashion is a very expensive topic not very affordable for normal people, with this method, I will show you how to card $1k of stuff from the site



Requirements:

  • Method – the most valuable item in carding. Gladly you have this to work with
    • NonVbv CC with Fullz – Buy a US CC from wcc
    • Proxy/Vpn/Rdp – For changing our virtual location while carding
    • VM – Use a PC/Mac with installed windows 8.1 vm to work with
    • Drop Address – A place to collect your items, visit cardingsecrets.su to get a drop

Site: dior.com

This is a fresh method so expect to Cashout big, whether you want to sell the items or you just want to card for your personal use

Steps:

  1. Buy Fullz From WCC

Go to wcc-plug.su and create a new account, fill your email and create password.
Use this link to avoid scam sites: https://wcc-plug.su  Many sites try to clone and host this site so make sure you click on the link above or type direct on address bar. Do not search for results. Account creation is free but make sure you top up your account in a day to avoid suspension. 
Go to your preferred country of choice and select Gold Cards. They work best. In my case I will work with US. Make sure you choose a card with full info and nonvbv like the one below



All cards are live and A balance checker is available so make sure you use it. Will help in making orders and make sure your card can hold the order amount.

  • Address
  • Nonvbv
  • Fullz
  • Names
  • Cvv




  • Proxy setup / Vpn Setup

Make a good decision on these as they play a big role in carding success rate. For Proxies, use vip72.com. They are the best providers

For VPN, most will work as long as the check is %100 ip check score. If you already have a vpn, check the score on whoer.net. If you don’t have a vpn, use express vpn and hma vpn

Choose Location according to your fullz info and make sure you match state and city if possible









Whenever possible, choose a local residential isp in the city, like in my case Comcast cable. You increase the chances of the site believing you are in the city.

  • Visit dior.com site

Here is the official page for Christian Dior designer, make sure you visit the correct link

Not all websites will work with this method.

I am carding to a US Drop So the I chose a US version of the website.

  • Create account and fill fullz info

There is many info to fill in the personal info tab so, make sure your fullz has the info required.

User Account info in most cases is the cardholder info, don’t mistake and start filling any other info, remember the cardholder is the owner of the account so try to make it look like that



  • Select your product

Select any product of your choice, Since we are checking out as a gift, you can choose a valuable item which your card can hold, In my Case I came across a good card from wcc with 3k balance, I will use the to charge about $2k of items !


I have done this before and know it will be ok since the site allows gifting of products
Below is my $1.5k sneaker, I will buy w of them, Find your best product you want and choose the size

  • checkout page

Now click on checkout and you should in the page as the below picture, Under Gift Options,
Draft a good message and add it, They will package the sneakers in a box with your message printed

Below is my version of the gift message, make sure you fake an occasion like birthday in my case



  • Add Drop address

Now on shipping Address option, they will select the default address which is the billing address of our cc holder, since we want to send a gift, add a new address and enter your drop address info



Your drop address should include the location where you want to receive your gift, or where your gift will be sent to.
you must include the name of the person who will collect the items. In my case I chose the following info.

Wondering why I disclose almost all my info, In this case I use fake ids to collect the info, the names are just random and will send someone with an id with such names,

If you need a fake physical id you can pm me

  • Shipping method

Select the fast shipping method available and proceed to payment options, In my case the fastest is next day delivery and will cost me extra $35 but its worth it


  • Add your Nonvbv Card

The last part is to add your card info and click on purchase now button to charge the card


When everything is ok, just click on the purchase button and wait to get an order confirmation notification


10. Summary




Any questions pm

    Extra tips & tricks https://t.me/carding_team_bot   on telegram      

TOOLS 🔨(Download) HOW TO GET DROP CARDING HELPdesk 🆘 CARDING METHODS
